000: The landschaftspark is open for public. There are lots of people walking around. The buildings are used for recreational purposes.
001: Some parts of the terrain are left to nature.
003: This is the space beneath the storage bunkers. It is flooded since the pumps are shut down.
004: The track on top of the bunkers. A number of the bridges had been restored.
005: A wagon to transport the cokes to the top of the blast furnace.
